channel.title: Money Heist on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Money Heist on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: What Do Charlie Kirk’s Killing and ‘Money Heist’ Have in Common? “Bella Ciao”
item.description: The anti-fascism anthem, seemingly referenced on a bullet casing found at the assassination scene, was also prominently featured in Netflix’s 2017 Spanish crime series.
